peril.views.slick.components.menus

Class HelpMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.util.Viewable
      • peril.views.slick.util.Clickable
        • peril.views.slick.components.menus.Menu
          • peril.views.slick.components.menus.HelpMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Container

    public final class HelpMenu
extends Menu
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a help window that displays information to the user. This window uses pages that resemble a doubly linked list nodes that point to the next page and previous page using the IDs of those pages.
    Since:
    2018-02-28
    Version:
    1.01.02
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Menu

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  HelpMenu.HelpPage
      A page on the HelpMenu that links to a next and previous HelpMenu.HelpPage.

    • Field Detail

      • NULL_PAGE

        public static final int NULL_PAGE
        The id of a null page. If this assigned to the next or previous page of a page the current page will not link to anything.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • addPage

        public void addPage(int id,
                    int nextPage,
                    int previousPage,
                    java.lang.String title)
        Adds a HelpMenu.HelpPage to this HelpMenu.
        Parameters:
        id - The uniquely identifying ID number of the new HelpMenu.HelpPage.
        nextPage - The uniquely identifying ID number of the next HelpMenu.HelpPage after the new HelpMenu.HelpPage.
        previousPage - The uniquely identifying ID number of the previous HelpMenu.HelpPage after the new HelpMenu.HelpPage.
        title - The title of the new HelpMenu.HelpPage.

      • changePage

        public void changePage(int pageId)
        Changes the currently displayed HelpMenu.HelpPage of the HelpMenu.
        Parameters:
        pageId - The uniquely identifying ID number of the new HelpMenu.HelpPage.

      • nextPage

        public void nextPage()
        Changes the HelpMenu.HelpPage being displayed by the HelpMenu to the next HelpMenu.HelpPage denoted by the current HelpMenu.HelpPage.

      • clearPage

        public void clearPage(int pageId)
        Clears the text from the HelpMenu.HelpPage denoted by the specified page id.
        Parameters:
        pageId - The uniquely identifying ID number of the HelpMenu.HelpPage to be cleared.

      • previousPage

        public void previousPage()
        Changes the HelpMenu.HelpPage being displayed by the HelpMenu to the previous HelpMenu.HelpPage denoted by the current HelpMenu.HelpPage.

      • addText

        public void addText(int pageId,
                    java.lang.String text)
        Adds text to the HelpMenu.HelpPage denoted by the specified id.
        Parameters:
        pageId - The uniquely identifying ID number of the HelpMenu.HelpPage.
        text - The text to be displayed on the HelpMenu.HelpPage.

      • draw

        public void draw(Frame frame)
        Draws thus HelpMenu on screen. If this HelpMenu is hidden, this with do nothing.
        Specified by:

        Overrides:

        Parameters:
